creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly acquired by the Center with the kind assistance of Carol Brooks and Prof. James Cahill in honor of George Schlenker
description: rocky, tree covered cliffs and rock formations at bottom with three huts in a valley at center; fisherman standing in partially covered boat at bottom center; soaring mountains at top
marks:
Signature, Inscription, Seals, and Stickers

UR  R edge: [Gyokushu Kuwa]
medium: Ink and light color on paper
title: Landscape in the Rain
